actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that moneys due the States under the provisions of the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920, as amended, may be used for purposes other than public roads and schools.

summary.text: Revises the Mineral Leasing Act by providing that moneys due the States under the Act may be used for planning, construction, and maintenance of public facilities and provision of public services.

titles.title: A bill to provide that moneys due the States under the provisions of the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920, as amended, may be used for purposes other than public roads and schools.
